pages.text: $(l:resources/moonstone_cores)Moonstone Cores$() are bursting with energy. It sounds like a very bad idea to discharge one within milliseconds.$(br2)$(italic)...but sometimes the worst ideas are the best, aren't they?$()$(br2)Their explosion does not damage blocks, but causes $(l:dimension/doomblooms#primordial_fire)immensely aggressive fire$().
